name: YoSmartLock
0:
”Alexa, ask yosmart to discovery devices”
”Alexa, ask yosmart to lock the Front Door”
”Alexa, ask yosmart to check the Front Door”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yosmart
des:
The YoSmart Lock skill is the voice interface to Milock YoSmart locks. To use this skill,you need to have a YoSmart Account through the YoSmart app on iOS or Android.
Hardware requirements: One YoSmart Hub which need to be connected the the internet router through RF45 internet cable. One or more MiLocks which is Alexa enabled. 
The Hub need to be registered to the customer's YoSmart account and the locks need to be linked to the Hub through the YoSmart App.
Then the customer need to link his/her amazon account to the YoSmart account. 
When you enable this skill,you will be prompted to link Alexa to your YoSmart Account. you will have to provide your username/email and password.Once you log in,you will be presented with a list your devices on your account to pick from to link to Alexa. You also can refresh your device list through tap "Discover Device" to get your newest devices in YoSmart app or talk to the Echo to discover devices.
The YoSmart Lock Skill allows you to control your smart devices by saying "Ask YoSmart".For example,if your assigned a spoken name of "backdoor" to one of your devices,you can say "Alexa ask YoSmart to lock the backdoor".
